Joy Onaolapo (24 Disemba 1982 na Sapele, Naijiria na July 2013) bụ onye mmeri Naijiria nke na-ebu ibu na Paralympic(2012). O meriri ihe nrite ọla edo putara 52 kilogram Na-ebuli ike Otuna 2012 Egwuregwu nke ndi London.
E gosipụtara na Onaolapo nwụrụ na ones July 2013 mgbe ọ dị afọ iri atọ. Onye bụbu onye isi ala Naijiria Goodluck Ebele Jonathan kọwara "ọnwụ nke onye nrite ọla edo nke Naijiria Paralympic, Mrs
Joy Onaolapo dị ka nnukwu Ọnwụ mfu nye mbaa
" Onye nkuzi aha ya but Ijeoma Iheriobim, Kọwaaputara Onaolapo nwụrụ anwụ dị ka onye na-eme egwuregwu na-arụsi ọrụ ike".
